step_name: Detect stale execution and timeout failures
description: Implement detection for stale phases (IN_PROGRESS too long) and timeout-related failures. Failure Modes: 1) stale_execution: IN_PROGRESS phase not updated for > 1 hour; 2) timeout_failure: Phase exceeded timeout threshold. Detection Mechanism: Compare phase start time to current time; Check if started_at + timeout > current_time. Recovery Suggestions Generated: 1) WHY: Stale state indicates agent failure to update or timeout; 2) HOW: Manual phase reset or extended timeout; 3) Actionable: Specific time threshold and reset command
acceptance_criteria: Detects stale IN_PROGRESS phases (threshold: 1 hour); Extracts time since last update; Generates recovery suggestions addressing stale state; Includes timestamp information in suggestions
test_scenario_coverage: AC-005.1 - Extended crash detection for timeouts

mapped_scenario.description: When phase IN_PROGRESS exceeds timeout threshold, stale execution recovery suggestions generated
